title: Video: JUDE. – Crystals
body:
Rapidly rising FL duo **JUDE.**

may only have two tracks to their name so far, but they’ve already become one of the most talked about new ‘blog’ artists of the year. With their Lorde-esque debut _Crystals_ clocking up 60k plays on Soundcloud, followed up by the equally as alluring, _Jaded_, the two piece have released visuals for the aforementioned Crystals. In keeping with their dark, ever-so mysterious sound, shot entirely in black and white, it’s a worthy further development of ‘JUDE.’.
